item.description:
Date:  Saturday Feb 2nd
Time:  6:30pm Start Time
Game:  NL Texas Hold Em Poker Tournament

Buyin:  $40 (no rebuys)

Starting stack:  100,000 chips

Bonus Chips:  25,000 (arrive by 6:15pm so we can start on time)

Blinds Start at 1,000/2,000 and levels are 20 minutes long

$5 from buyins towards pizza, sodas, water and snacks.

Already have players outside of Meetup attending, so they won't be reflected in the attendance here but I'll add what I can as my + RSVP's.

Up to two-tables for the tournament.

 

CASH GAME:  Also will have a 1/2 NL cash game starting around 8-9pm as players bust out.

Tournament is self-dealt, cash game has a dedicated dealer.

$25 button bonus in the cash game player who gets the button at the start gets bonus cash

Player Referral Bonus: Each new player you bring to my cash game nets you $20 bonus cash!

Bad Beat Jackpot for the cash game is up to $220 and the qualifier is losing with Nines Full.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: $40 NL Hold Em Poker Tournament at Anthony's in East Windsor
